summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6666 for the improvement of the alley in block 1, Herbert S. Upper's First Replat of Lincoln Beach, being the alley between California Ave. S.W. and 44th Ave. S.W. from S.W. Myrtle St. to S.W. Othello St.; by paving the same; by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary; providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 105207, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
